snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has promised to step up efforts to deter, detain and deport illegal migrants to Israel, as tensions mounted over an influx of asylum seekers from Africa.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu promises to step up efforts to deter, detain and deport illegal migrants, as tensions mount over an influx of asylum seekers from Africa; Netanyahu's pledge comes a day after an early morning fire, apparently set by arsonists, ravaged an apartment occupied by about 10 Eritrean migrants in Jerusalem.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has promised to step up efforts to deter, detain and deport illegal migrants to Israel, as tensions mounted over an influx of asylum seekers from Africa.

headline.seo: Netanyahu Vows Crackdown on African Asylum Seekers
headline.main: Israeli Leader Pledges Hard Line on Migrants
headline.print_headline: Israeli Leader Pledges Hard Line on Migrants
